school_tkinter module

school_tkinter.add_course()[source]

Add a new course based on form inputs.

Creates a Course and stores it in the global list.

school_tkinter.add_instructor()[source]

Add a new instructor based on form inputs.

Creates an Instructor and adds it to the global list. Updates the instructor treeview.

school_tkinter.add_student()[source]

Add a new student based on form inputs.

Reads the fields (ID, name, age, email), creates a Student, adds it to the global list, and updates the treeview.

Shows an error message if something goes wrong (e.g. invalid age).

school_tkinter.assign_course_to_instructor()[source]

Assign a course to an instructor.

Links the instructor and course via assign_course.

school_tkinter.delete_selected_course()[source]

Delete the currently selected course.

Removes it from courses and refreshes the tree.

school_tkinter.delete_selected_instructor()[source]

Delete the currently selected instructor.

Removes them from instructors and refreshes the tree.

school_tkinter.delete_selected_student()[source]

Delete the currently selected student.

Removes them from students and refreshes the tree.

school_tkinter.load_data()[source]

Load data from a JSON file.

Recreates students, instructors, and courses from saved JSON. Also re-links relationships:

  • Which students are enrolled in which courses

  • Which instructor is assigned to which course

Updates the treeviews when done.

school_tkinter.refresh_treeview()[source]

Refresh all treeviews (students, instructors, courses).

This clears out the treeviews and repopulates them with the latest data from the global students, instructors, and courses lists.

school_tkinter.register_course_to_student()[source]

Register a student to a selected course.

Uses the ID from the form and the course from the dropdown. Calls student.register_course if valid.

school_tkinter.save_data()[source]

Save all data (students, instructors, courses) to a JSON file.

Opens a save dialog so the user can choose where to save. Each object is serialized via its to_dict method.

A popup message is shown if saving succeeds.

school_tkinter.update_course_dropdown()[source]

Update the course dropdown in the student tab.

Keeps the options current after courses are added/removed.

school_tkinter.update_dropdowns_loop()[source]

Periodically update dropdowns.

Ensures the course dropdowns for students and instructors are always up to date. Runs every second.
